sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../styles/tour-details.css'; import { Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import tourDate from '../assets/data/tours'; import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating'; const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourDate.find(tour=> tour.id === id) const {photo,title,desc,price,address, reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize}= tour; const{totalRating,avgRating}=calculateAvgRating(reviews) return (

{title}

{calculateAvgRating ===0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0?( "Not rated" ):( ({reviews?.length}))} {address }
{city} ${price}/per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

Reviews ({reviews ?. length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{/*================tour reviews */}
) } export default TourDetails
